de.must.util
Class MustTime

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Date
      java.sql.Time
          de.must.util.MustTime
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<java.util.Date>
public class MustTime
extends java.sql.Time

Extended java.sql.Time class to simplify transformations from integer to time among others.

See Also:

valueOfEloquentInteger

public static java.sql.Time valueOfEloquentInteger(int eloquentInteger)
Returns the time given by an eloquent integer, e.g. 235959

Parameters:
eloquentInteger - the eloquent integer, e.g. 235959. This is not a millisecond value, but three pairs of digits naming hour, minute and seconds.
Returns:
Time

getIntegerEquivalent

public static int getIntegerEquivalent(java.sql.Time time)
Returns the integer equivalent of the specified time in an eloquent way - not a millisecond value.

Parameters:
time - the time to parse.
Returns:
int Returns the integer equivalent of the specified time in an eloquent way, e.g. 235959
